title: Cloudant gives at least 1 business day notice of maintenance

tosdr.tldr: Cloudant schedules maintenance during non-peak usage hours. If this means that the Hosting Platform will be unavailable, users will notified at least 1 business day prior, unless the maintenance is being conducted due to an emergency.
